thread.section_title: POP Yachts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of POP Yachts | popyachts.com
thread.title: John M. Kennedy
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by John M. Kennedy

author: John M. Kennedy
title: John M. Kennedy
text: We have had two interactions with Pop Yachts. The first was the purchase of a Island Packet 31. The second was the sale of our 52 year old Pearson Vanguard; both were handled with professional precision rarely seen in most sale organizations. I was not sure that we could find a person interested in a vintage sailboat. My foray on Craigslist produced no solid leads in 4 months. Pop Yachts found a buyer in 2 months. I was very impressed with the weekly reports on views of our add on Pop Yachts. It showed the national and international attention generated by the add. Our broker communicated weekly and only brought good offers to the table. Very impressed. Great Work!!
